Title: Worldsoul: Forging a Pact
Description:
I've heard some reports of the goings on in Azj-Kahet. Nerubians have killed my people mercilessly since we arrived... it is very difficult to imagine them as allies.

But... I understand feeling... different from the rest of your people. Perhaps these nerubians who have interest in us are also... different. 

<Faerin sighs.> 

No matter the cost... I can't bear to not give them a chance. Are they not also inhabitants of Khaz Algar?

See what aid you can bring them, my friend.
ObjectivesText: Select a Severed Threads Pact to represent in Azj-Kahet, complete objectives in their name, and slay rares in Khaz Algar.
